name: Accelerate
oracle_text:
Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I've seen lightning move slower."

name: Aquamoeba

flavor_text: Some tides need no moon.

name: Aven Trooper
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}{W}, Discard a card: Aven Trooper gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The very skies seethe with the aven's hatred for the Cabal.

name: Barbarian Outcast
oracle_text: When you control no Swamps, sacrifice Barbarian Outcast.
flavor_text:
"We offer power to anyone willing to take it. Sadly, few are unburdened enough by their prejudices to accept."
—Cabal surgeon

name: Basking Rootwalla
oracle_text:
{1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
Madness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Cabal Ritual
oracle_text:
Add {B}{B}{B}.
Threshold — Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Each syllable chills your veins. Each word rattles your mind."
—Cabal Patriarch

name: Cabal Surgeon
oracle_text: {2}{B}{B}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "Clerics give up when their patients die. Can I help it if I'm more compassionate?"

name: Cabal Torturer
oracle_text:
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Threshold — {3}{B}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Carrion Rats
oracle_text: Whenever Carrion Rats attacks or blocks, any player may exile a card from their graveyard. If a player does, Carrion Rats assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor_text:
"Just what I need—more competition."
—Cabal grave robber

name: Centaur Veteran
oracle_text:
Trample
{G}, Discard a card: Regenerate Centaur Veteran.
flavor_text: He wears his scars like badges of honor, warning his foes that he's not easily defeated.

name: Cephalid Aristocrat
oracle_text: Whenever Cephalid Aristocrat becomes the target of a spell or ability, mill two cards.
flavor_text: It's easy to tell the difference between the devious cephalids and the trustworthy ones. The trustworthy ones are dead.

name: Cephalid Snitch
oracle_text: Sacrifice Cephalid Snitch: Target creature loses protection from black until end of turn.
flavor_text: The cautious are wary of their enemies. The wise are also wary of their friends.

name: Churning Eddy
oracle_text: Return target creature and target land to their owners' hands.
flavor_text:
"Magic is like the tide—both ebb, both flow, and both serve my whims."
—Empress Llawan

name: Coral Net
oracle_text:
Enchant green or white creature

oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Enslaved Dwarf: Target black creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: Captive dwarves always regain their freedom, either through escape or through a desperate, fiery death.

name: Faceless Butcher
oracle_text:
When Faceless Butcher enters the battlefield, exile target creature other than Faceless Butcher.
When Faceless Butcher leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Enchant creature

oracle_text:
Destroy target enchantment.
Madness {W} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Hydromorph Guardian
oracle_text: {U}, Sacrifice Hydromorph Guardian: Counter target spell that targets a creature you control.

name: Invigorating Falls
oracle_text: You gain life equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

name: Liquify
oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value 3 or less. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

name: Longhorn Firebeast
oracle_text: When Longhorn Firebeast enters the battlefield, any opponent may have it deal 5 damage to them. If a player does, sacrifice Longhorn Firebeast.
